name: Zhonya's Hourglass

active.name: Time Stop
active.effects: Put yourself in {{tip|stasis (buff)|stasis}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds, rendering you {{tip|untargetable}} and {{tip|invulnerable}} for the duration but also unable to move, declare [[basic attack]]s, cast [[champion ability|abilities]], use [[summoner spell]]s, or [[active ability items|activate items]].

effects_structured.raw: Put yourself in {{tip stasis (buff) stasis}} for {{fd 2.5}} seconds, rendering you {{tip untargetable}} and {{tip invulnerable}} for the duration but also unable to move, declare [[basic attack]]s, cast [[champion ability abilities]], use [[summoner spell]]s, or [[active ability items activate items]].

simpleDescription: Activate to become invincible but unable to take actions
